类 TimeseriesPlot

public class TimeseriesPlot
extends java.lang.Object

Creates CombinedDomainXYPlot and XYPlot for the timeseries chart.

构造函数详细信息

TimeseriesPlot

public TimeseriesPlot(TimeseriesDataset dataset,
                      org.jfree.chart.axis.SegmentedTimeline timeline,
                      TimeseriesArea timeseriesArea)
Creates a new TimeseriesPlot instance.

参数：
dataset - timeseries data set(null not permitted).
timeline - a "segmented" timeline.
timeseriesArea - timeseries area.
